search.query: index=$prod$ host="*" mbean_domain="org.cloudfoundry" earliest=-30m latest=now()| eval job_and_index = jvmDescription + "_" +mbean_property_job + "_" + mbean_property_index | rename system.healthy AS healthy | fields job_and_index healthy |timechart span=1d avg(healthy) as "System_Health" by job_and_index useother=f limit=100| untable _time job_and_index "System_Health"
